resources.string: Activate only when SIM card is on the white list
Turn off tethering and internet connection for specified hours
Add current SIM card to the white list (all simcards on the list will be acceptable)
Remove current SIM card from the white list (connection will be denied if phone uses this simcard)
Removed SIM card from list and checked option \'Activate on SIM card from the white lists results that app will not be activated
Unable to retrieve SIM card serial!
Switch off Internet Connection on idle
Switch off WiFi Tethering on idle
Do you want to exit and stop service?
Do you want to reset current settings?

By default connection to internet and WiFi tethering are turned off. You need to set it manually. 
Connecting via packet data may incur additional charges. 
WIFI tethering will increase battery consumption. 

Do you want to turn on 3G connection and WIFI tethering?
Turned off internet connection at scheduled time
Turned off WiFi Tethering at scheduled time
Turned off internet connection due to clients inactivity
Turned off WiFi Tethering due to clients inactivity
Inserted SIM card is blocked by the settings or network is unavailable!
Restore network state before run the service
Service disabled due to roaming network
Keep service running after start tethering

[x] Refactoring of scheduler - now you can configure multiple time scheduler repeated weekly for configured days of the week
 PLEASE REVIEW AND UPDATE YOUR SCHEDULER SETTINGS

[x] Application works as a service depends on configuration (default = yes)
